solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public boolean isInterleave(String s1, String s2, String s3) {--newline--    --newline--        if ((s1.length()+s2.length())!=s3.length()) return false;--newline--    --newline--        boolean[][] matrix = new boolean[s2.length()+1][s1.length()+1];--newline--    --newline--        matrix[0][0] = true;--newline--    --newline--        for (int i = 1; i < matrix[0].length; i++){--newline--            matrix[0][i] = matrix[0][i-1]&&(s1.charAt(i-1)==s3.charAt(i-1));--newline--        }--newline--    --newline--        for (int i = 1; i < matrix.length; i++){--newline--            matrix[i][0] = matrix[i-1][0]&&(s2.charAt(i-1)==s3.charAt(i-1));--newline--        }--newline--    --newline--        for (int i = 1; i < matrix.length; i++){--newline--            for (int j = 1; j < matrix[0].length; j++){--newline--                matrix[i][j] = (matrix[i-1][j]&&(s2.charAt(i-1)==s3.charAt(i+j-1)))--newline--                        || (matrix[i][j-1]&&(s1.charAt(j-1)==s3.charAt(i+j-1)));--newline--            }--newline--        }--newline--    --newline--        return matrix[s2.length()][s1.length()];--newline--    --newline--    }--newline--}
